Web map analytics

We're integrating with all modern mapping platforms.

We're developing Maptiks to be compatible with all modern mapping platforms, out of the box.

Available today

Plugin. Connect. And track.

Coming soon
This is just the start

Developers, this one is for you.

Integrating with all of the tools you already love and use.

With our BETA software, we introduced mapping analytics for all open source mapping platforms. Major international clients now depend on Maptiks to provide analytics for all of their web maps. But we want to do more. We are entirely focused on building the best tools for GIS developers, which means playing friendly with all of your other tools you depend on.

  • Slack
  • Pagerduty
  • Segment

We build a lot of maps. And mapping analytics is just the beginning.

We are geospatial nerds and we love building maps. And now, anyone can get enterprise level analytics for their web maps with just a few clicks. But we're not stopping there. Our goal is to provide better insights into who and how your web maps are being used, without having to build your own custom dashboards and waste precious development time.We're here to help entrepreneurs, GIS teams and consultants focus on what really matters - building the best user experience and growing their business.

Get started with web map analytics. Integrate all of your web maps and #buildabettermap.

  • About

  • Maptiks is built for GIS developers and teams who are frustrated by not having enough insights regarding their web maps.
